entities.name: Project
entities.description: Project level metadata.

entities.name: Sample
entities.description: Sample Index  to Sample ID mapping, and main sample metadata.

entities.name: Clinical Triplet
entities.description: Extended metadata in three column format, where SampleId is column 1, metadata header is column 2, and metadata value is column 3. If metadata are missing for the sample, it will not be listed in this file.

entities.name: Gene
entities.description: Gene Index to GeneID mapping and annotation of genes in the gene model used.

entities.name: Gene FPKM
entities.description: Gene level RNAseq expression level, as raw counts and normalized FPKM data.

entities.name: Comparison
entities.description: Comparison Index to Comparison ID mapping and annotation of comparisons.

entities.name: Comparison Data
entities.description: Comparison data (fold change, p value, etc)

entities.name: Mutation
entities.description: Mutation Index to Mutation ID mapping and annotation of mutations. It is recommended to use mutations_canonical, which uses the Mutation Gene Model with a single canonical transcript for each gene.

entities.name: Mutation
entities.description: Mutation Index to Mutation ID mapping and annotation of mutations, based on the Mutation Gene Model (recommended file), which uses a single canonical transcript for each gene.

entities.name: RNA Seq Somatic Mutation
entities.description: Mutation calls from RNAseq data, excluding any germline mutations.

entities.name: Fusion Data
entities.description: Quantification of reads supporting fusions from single end and paired end data.

entities.name: Fusion
entities.description: Fusion Index to Fusion ID lookup table, annotation of detected fusions.

entities.name: Exon Data
entities.description: RNAseq read counts and RPKM detected for each annotated exon for each sample.

entities.name: Exon
entities.description: Exon Index to Exon ID mapping and annotation of detected exons.

entities.name: Exon Junction Data
entities.description: RNAseq read counts detected for each annotated exon junction.

entities.name: Exon Junction
entities.description: Exon Junction Index to Exon Junction ID mapping and annotation of detected exon junctions.

entities.name: Transcript
entities.description: Transcript Index to TranscriptID mapping and annotation of transcripts in the gene model used.

entities.name: Transcript FPKM
entities.description: Transcript level RNAseq expression level, as raw counts and normalized FPKM data.

entities.name: Reverse Phase Protein Array
entities.description: Reverse Phase Protein Array ratios compared to Universal Human Reference data.

entities.name: Mass Spectrometry
entities.description: Mass Spectrometry of protein and modification detection compared to Universal Human Reference data.

entities.name: DNA Seq Somatic Mutation
entities.description: Mutation calls from DNAseq data, excluding any germline mutations.

entities.name: CNV Gene Level Data
entities.description: Gene level copy number (log2ratio) for each sample. For genes across two or more segments, the value is the length-weighted average across segments.

entities.name: Copy Number (CNV) Segment
entities.description: Log2ratio value of copy number for each segment (log2(copynumber/2)), centered on 0.

entities.name: CNV Segment Gene Mapping
entities.description: Copy number segment to gene mapping.

entities.name: Micro RNA Seq
entities.description: microRNAseq expression level, as raw counts and normalized Reads Per Million data.

campaignType.name: Gene
campaignType.description: Target campaigns are used to prioritize and answer questions of targets

predefinedQuestions.text: Is there literature supporting the rationale of gene-disease association?
What is the druggability of the target?
What is the competition status of the target? Are there advanced clinical programs?
For the target, what is the gene/protein expression level in the relevant tissue?
